title: Build OpenAPI RAG System with MCP Server
description: Implement a local RAG system that ingests OpenAPI specifications, creates vector embeddings, and exposes them via an MCP server for IDE integration. This allows AI assistants to retrieve relevant API context for answering questions.

title: Implement ingest.py for OpenAPI processing
description: Load OpenAPI JSON from /api_specs, parse paths and methods, create one LangChain Document per endpoint with summary/description/parameters/request/response, generate embeddings, and persist to ChromaDB in /vector_store.
close_reason: Implemented comprehensive ingestion script that loads OpenAPI specs, creates structured documents per endpoint with full parameter/request/response details, generates embeddings, and persists to ChromaDB vector store

title: Setup project structure and development environment
description: Create directory structure, Python virtual environment, .gitignore, and initial configuration files (.env.example, config.py). Set up the foundational project layout per rag_plan.md.
close_reason: Created project structure with directories (api_specs, vector_store), virtual environment, .gitignore, .env.example, config.py with path management, and initial README.md

title: Implement server.py MCP server
description: Create Flask/FastAPI server with /query endpoint that accepts natural language queries, uses query.py logic to retrieve relevant context from vector store, and returns context as JSON for IDE AI assistants to consume.

title: Write README.md documentation
description: Document project overview, architecture, setup instructions, usage examples for ingest.py/query.py/server.py, configuration details, and how to integrate with IDE AI assistants.

title: Implement query.py for context retrieval
description: Load vector store from /vector_store, load embedding model, create retriever, accept query from command line, retrieve relevant documents using semantic similarity, and output context to console.
close_reason: Implemented query.py for context retrieval with vector store loading, semantic similarity search, formatted output with metadata, and command-line interface for testing

title: Create requirements.txt with project dependencies
description: Define all Python dependencies: langchain, chromadb-client (or faiss-cpu), sentence-transformers, python-dotenv, and any web framework dependencies (Flask/FastAPI) for the MCP server.
close_reason: Created requirements.txt with all necessary dependencies: langchain for RAG, chromadb for vector store, sentence-transformers for embeddings, fastapi/uvicorn for MCP server, and python-dotenv for configuration
